name: The Red Scare
description:
This is an early stages, in-development build of a top-down 3d detective game. You play as a 1920s Pinkerton detective in a small mid-Western town, solving crimes related to a mysterious Communist presence.

CONTROLS

Left click bottom left icon to open dossier.

Right click on citizens to interrogate and arrest them

On default, game will end once communism level reaches 100. arresting communists will reduce it. Reducing it to 0 wins the game.
